quotes.quote: Get off your horse and drink your milk
quotes.author: John Wayne

quotes.quote: Milk is for babies. When you grow up you have to drink beer
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: I don't like looking back. I'm always constantly looking forward. I'm not the one to sort of sit and cry over spilt milk. I'm too busy looking for the next cow
quotes.author: Gordon Ramsay

quotes.quote: There is no sense in crying over spilt milk. Why bewail what is done and cannot be recalled?
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: The cow is of the bovine ilk; one end is moo, the other milk
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: You can only milk a cow so long, then you're left holding the pail
quotes.author: Hank Aaron

quotes.quote: Never cry over spilt milk, because it may have been poisoned
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.quote: I am thankful for laughter, except when milk comes out of my nose
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Circumstantial evidence is occasionally very convincing, as when you find a trout in the milk, to quote Thoreau's example
quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: It is not well for a man to pray cream and live skim milk
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: There's nothing better than cornflakes with hot milk. It's my Sunday treat
quotes.author: Gemma Collins

quotes.quote: In Hollywood a marriage is a success if it outlasts milk
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: You don't put milk in camomile tea - that's disgusting behaviour! That's not right
quotes.author: Laura Fraser

quotes.quote: Skimmed milk was what they used to give to prisoners and workhouse inmates to go with their porridge and gruel. It's a punishment, not a drink
quotes.author: Peter Hitchens

quotes.quote: I won't eat any cereal that doesn't turn the milk purple
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: Wearing underwear on the outside of your clothes can turn a tedious trip to the store for a forgotten carton of milk into an amusement park romp
quotes.author: Patch Adams

quotes.quote: Cheese is milk's leap towards immortality
quotes.author: Clifton Fadiman

quotes.quote: I don't even like milk
quotes.author: Richard Carpenter

quotes.quote: Tea has always been a big thing in my life. And I'm not talking about Liptons with lemon or iced tea, or any of that nonsense. Has to be hot PG Tips with milk
quotes.author: Paul Rudd

quotes.quote: A corpse is meat gone bad. Well and what's cheese? Corpse of milk
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.quote: If an actor knows how to milk a cow, I always know it will not be difficult to be in business with him
quotes.author: Werner Herzog

quotes.quote: A true yogi may remain dutifully in the world; there, he is like butter on water and not like the easily-diluted milk of unchurned and undisciplined humanity
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.quote: Let's say you have white milk and chocolate milk, and one of them is good emotions and one of them is bad emotions, and you pour both in: you're still going to fill up and run over
quotes.author: Stormy Daniels

quotes.quote: Maybe it's a little ambitious of me to presume that, no matter how big the film is, I can always go down to the shop to buy a pint of milk
quotes.author: Tom Hardy

quotes.quote: A publisher who writes is like a cow in a milk bar
quotes.author: Arthur Koestler

quotes.quote: If a queen bee were crossed with a Freisian bull, would not the land flow with milk and honey?
quotes.author: Oliver St. John

quotes.quote: Coffee in England is just toasted milk
quotes.author: Christopher Fry

quotes.quote: There are many other kinds of milk available. Why don't we try drinking rats' milk and dogs' milk?
quotes.author: Heather Mills

quotes.quote: Milk which is about to turn is akin to that moment spent on the cusp of failure in a dulled and fettered relationship
quotes.author: Matt Roper

quotes.quote: If someone paid me a million dollars to drink a glass of milk, I wouldn't do it; maybe that's because I don't need the money
quotes.author: David H. Murdock

quotes.quote: I write in order to attain that feeling of tension relieved and function achieved which a cow enjoys on giving milk
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: All the good ideas I ever had came to me while I was milking a cow
quotes.author: Grant Wood

quotes.quote: The average man is a conformist, accepting miseries and disasters with the stoicism of a cow standing in the rain
quotes.author: Colin Wilson

quotes.quote: I always thought the word 'cow' was funny. And cows are sort of tragic figures. Cows blur the line between tragedy and humor
quotes.author: Gary Larson

quotes.quote: 'Moo' may represent an idea, but only the cow knows
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Don't have a cow, man
quotes.author: Bart Simpson

quotes.quote: There's nothing like sitting back and talking to your cows
quotes.author: Russell Crowe

quotes.quote: Total contentment is only for cows
quotes.author: Bette Midler

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter how much milk you spill, as long as you don't lose the cow
quotes.author: Harvey Mackay

quotes.quote: My wife's father said 'if you marry my daughter, I'll give you three acres and a cow.' I'm still waiting for the three acres
quotes.author: Max Miller

quotes.quote: Knowledge is a sacred cow, and my problem is how we can milk her while keeping clear of her horns
quotes.author: Albert Szent-Gyorgyi

quotes.quote: Who discovered that we could get milk from cows, and what did he think he was doing at the time?
quotes.author: Billy Connolly

quotes.quote: Playing golf is like chasing a quinine pill around a cow pasture
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Sacred cows make the best hamburger
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The path of life is strewn with cow pats from the devil's own satanic herd!
quotes.author: Rowan Atkinson

quotes.quote: If a cow laughed, would milk come out of her nose?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: She always says, my lord, that facts are like cows. If you look them in the face hard enough they generally run away
quotes.author: Dorothy L. Sayers

quotes.quote: As for butter versus margarine, I trust cows more than chemists
quotes.author: Joan Dye Gussow

quotes.quote: If you want milk, don't sit on a stool in the middle of a field in the hope that a cow will back up to you
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: Custard: A detestable substance produced by the malevolent conspiracy of the hen, the cow and the cook
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce
